mainText:
He changed the world and changed people's life style! He founded the Apple,
and he created Macintosh I, Macintosh II and iPod, iMac, MacBPro,mini,
iPhone, iPad.
Everyone in the world like Apple products. Steve is an angel, he makes the
world more beautiful, and better! In Chinese MicroBlog Sina-Weibo, there are
many many wishes, and remembering in the website. Everyone heard this news
in the morning, they felt heart-broken. Yes, Steve Jobs changed the world.
header: Steve Jobs- Live is to change the world!
author: Jeffrey
